questions.text: Have I spoken charitably about others, especially other women?
Have I celebrated my husband’s and children's strengths without comparison?
Have I shown love to my husband even when upset or tired?
Have I welcomed opportunities to serve others joyfully?
Have I rejected envy and chosen gratitude?
Have I prayed for those I find difficult to love?
Have I supported other families without jealousy?
Have I offered kindness in small, daily moments?
Have I used my words to lift others up?
Have I asked God to expand my heart in charity?
Have I embraced my vocation with faithfulness and care?
Have I fulfilled my responsibilities without complaining?
Have I made time for prayer and spiritual growth?
Have I used my time wisely, balancing work and rest?
Have I managed the home with joy and purpose?
Have I been present and attentive to my husband and children?
Have I avoided procrastinating on important tasks?
Have I helped my family grow in virtue by example?
Have I started and ended my day with prayer?
Have I seen my duties as opportunities to love God?
Have I honored my body and soul as sacred?
Have I been faithful to my husband in thought and action?
Have I guarded my eyes and heart from inappropriate content?
Have I treated intimacy as a gift, not a demand or burden?
Have I respected my husband’s dignity in speech and thought?
Have I discussed boundaries and desires with charity and honesty?
Have I dressed modestly, with self-respect and love for others?
Have I turned to prayer in moments of temptation?
Have I spoken to others with purity and reverence?
Have I taught my children the beauty of chastity by example?
Have I spoken harshly in frustration or anger?
Have I lost my temper over small inconveniences?
Have I practiced patience with my husband’s weaknesses?
Have I corrected others with gentleness and care?
Have I listened fully before reacting?
Have I asked forgiveness when I’ve been angry?
Have I modeled peaceful conflict resolution for my family?
Have I responded with compassion to those who irritate me?
Have I trusted God’s timing over my own expectations?
Have I chosen peace over winning an argument?
Have I chosen kindness over self-interest in my family?
Have I shared time, attention, and resources generously?
Have I welcomed others with warmth and openness?
Have I corrected my spouse and children with gentleness?
Have I offered compliments more often than complaints?
Have I cared for my family’s needs before personal wants?
Have I expressed gratitude and affection daily?
Have I volunteered my help without being asked?
Have I modeled compassion in speech and action?
Have I lived simply and shared freely?
Have I practiced moderation in food, drink, shopping, or media?
Have I maintained healthy boundaries with social media?
Have I kept spending aligned with our shared goals?
Have I avoided bingeing on comfort to escape stress?
Have I respected my body as a temple of the Holy Spirit?
Have I fasted or made small sacrifices with intention?
Have I balanced leisure with responsibilities?
Have I modeled self-control for my children?
Have I created a peaceful home free from excess?
Have I thanked God rather than desiring more?
Have I admitted when I was wrong and sought forgiveness?
Have I given credit and praise to others?
Have I received correction without defensiveness?
Have I asked for help when needed?
Have I placed my husband’s needs above my preferences?
Have I spoken about others with understanding, not judgment?
Have I prayed for the grace to be small before God?
Have I seen my strengths as gifts, not achievements?
Have I avoided comparing my family to others?
Have I offered my love quietly without needing recognition?
